text: Reminder: If you had a magic wand and could have any feature in HubSpot what would it be? Post your idea to the idea forum, then link to it from here so folks can help upvote your idea. Upvotes help HubSpotters quantify demand for functionality and influence our prioritization.

I would love for this hilariously bad analytics experience to be fixed - Clicking on the metric button on a listing page just takes you to the generic page traffic report, and there's not actually a way to quickly and easily filter into listing analytics :smiling_face_with_tear:- <https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/HubSpot-Ideas/Enable-Traffic-Analytics-on-Blog-Listing-Pages/idi-p/848323>
